• Hyperlinks"}},{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"is.workflow.actions.filter.notes","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"WFContentItemInputParameter":"Library","WFContentItemLimitEnabled":true,"UUID":"35CC9178-F234-43BF-90E1-4A153EF76893","WFContentItemLimitNumber":1,"WFContentItemFilter":{"Value":{"WFActionParameterFilterPrefix":1,"WFContentPredicateBoundedDate":false,"WFActionParameterFilterTemplates":[{"Operator":99,"Values":{"Unit":4,"String":{"Value":{"string":"￼","attachmentsByRange":{"{0, 1}":{"Type":"ExtensionInput"}}},"WFSerializationType":"WFTextTokenString"}},"Removable":true,"Property":"Name"}]},"WFSerializationType":"WFContentPredicateTableTemplate"}}},{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"is.workflow.actions.setclipboard","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"WFInput":{"Value":{"Type":"ActionOutput","OutputName":"Notes","OutputUUID":"35CC9178-F234-43BF-90E1-4A153EF76893","Aggrandizements":[{"PropertyUserInfo":"contents","Type":"WFPropertyVariableAggrandizement","PropertyName":"Body"}]},"WFSerializationType":"WFTextTokenAttachment"},"UUID":"AC4FBF80-2948-4890-871A-2326E6CABA1B"}},{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"is.workflow.actions.getmarkdownfromrichtext","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"WFInput":{"Value":{"Type":"Clipboard"},"WFSerializationType":"WFTextTokenAttachment"},"UUID":"DE5F6290-FCB9-4DA9-AE6E-8197DB1580F6"}},{"WFWorkflowActionIdentifier":"is.workflow.actions.output","WFWorkflowActionParameters":{"WFOutput":{"Value":{"string":"￼","attachmentsByRange":{"{0, 1}":{"OutputUUID":"DE5F6290-FCB9-4DA9-AE6E-8197DB1580F6","Type":"ActionOutput","OutputName":"Markdown from Rich Text"}}},"WFSerializationType":"WFTextTokenString"}}}],"WFWorkflowInputContentItemClasses":["WFStringContentItem"],"WFWorkflowImportQuestions":[],"WFQuickActionSurfaces":[],"WFWorkflowTypes":[],"WFWorkflowHasShortcutInputVariables":true}
